case_vignette: During a humanitarian medical mission in rural Vietnam, a medical resident encounters a 50-year-old man with a year-long history of a pruritic rash on his upper body and face, along with numbness and tingling sensation of both of his palms. He mostly works on his family’s rice farm, where he also takes care of livestock. A physical examination revealed multiple erythematous macules and papules on the face, arms, chest, and back, as well as thinning of the eyebrows and loss of some eyelashes. Additional findings include hypopigmented macules around the elbows, which are insensitive to light touch, temperature, and pinprick. The grip strength is slightly diminished bilaterally with the conservation of both bicipital reflexes.
question: What is the most likely diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Infectious Diseases. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've had an itchy rash on my upper body and face for a year, and I'm also feeling numbness and a tingling sensation in both of my hands.
Have you had any other symptoms such as fever, joint pain, or fatigue?
No, I haven't had any fever, joint pain, or fatigue.
Have you had any recent travel history or exposure to any animals or insects?
I mostly work on my family's rice farm and take care of livestock.
Have you had any recent changes in your diet or lifestyle?
No, there haven't been any recent changes in my diet or lifestyle.
Have you had any recent contact with anyone who has been diagnosed with a skin condition or has had a rash?
No, I haven't had contact with anyone diagnosed with a skin condition or rash.
Have you had any family history of skin conditions or allergies?
The information about family history of skin conditions or allergies is not provided.
Final Diagnosis: Atopic Dermatitis.
